thread.title: Web Entrepreneur Launches GBSMerchantSolutions.com, a Website Offering Quality Merchant Services

author: cbs8
title: Web Entrepreneur Launches GBSMerchantSolutions.com, a Website Offering Quality Merchant Services
text:
Founder of GBSMerchantSolutions.com, Godofredo Salvallon, is launching an up-and-coming website offering a wide selection of merchant services for business owners with online businesses, retail stores, and mobile businesses. For more information, visit the website's blog at MerchantCreditCardSolutionsBlog.com.
Hayward, CA -- ( ReleaseWire ) -- 10/08/2015 -- Godofredo Salvallon is proud to announce the creation and launch of his new website venture, http://www.GBSMerchantSolutions.com . The website offers high quality merchant services for business owners with businesses of many different types. Salvallon was inspired to start his website by his desire to help business owners increase sales in their businesses by being able to readily accept credit cards. The website offers merchant services for businesses of all types.
There are many excellent types of merchant services featured within the pages of GBSMerchantSolutions.com. The website offers services including bank credit card processing, nonprofit credit card processing, electronic credit card processing, online credit card processing, and much more. Business owners of all types are sure to be able to find the right kind of merchant services to fit in with their businesses. They can easily and quickly obtain great merchant services from this website.
Providing a great looking website with services that businesses can really rely on, is important to Salvallon regarding GBSMerchantSolutions.com. The website has been designed to be attractive and easy to navigate so that business owners can easily find out about the different types of services that are available. Once they find something that they like they can easily sign up online to start receiving fast and secure merchant services.
To complement the main website, Salvallon is also launching a blog located at http://www.MerchantCreditCardSolutionsBlog.com
The blog will cover topics that relate to merchant services. Salvallon will be talking about the importance of merchant services, how to choose the right merchant services for a business, and additional information about the services that are offered. The purpose of the blog is to further educate business owners and help them find the merchant services that will help them boost the sales for their businesses.
About GBSMerchantSolutions.com
GBSMerchantSolutions.com is owned and operated by Web entrepreneur Godofredo Salvallon. Salvallon is also associated with http://www.5LinxPaymentSolutions.com
